item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
Oh hey, someone mentioned some offer of HL2 M for free so I did some checking and found this:
https://steampowered.com/ati_offer1a/
Not sure if it’s still valid since it doesn’t come up in any searches through the Steam store… someone wanna try it out and see if it’s valid?

EDIT: about ping… I’m not too impressed with my ISP, but none the less, it seems the only servers that show over 300 are in Russia, Thailand and Arab Emirates. The ones I’ve seen that actually advertise being in Australia seem to ping <250 for me.

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: Door
item.description:
baconeggs:

The hell? I don’t notice any major drop in gameplay until 400 where it starts to get choppy. 500 and frames are noticeably lacking. Any higher and I begin teleporting backwards as I run forwards.

I feel the same way.
What the hell is with certain Europeans/Americans complaining about 300+ pings?

Anyway, I think we should find someone that could host a match of the higher voted games. Cameron seems a logical choice to me, but for some people the ping might be 500+ :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
The difference between 100 and 300+ is noticable, the difference between 50 and 100 is not noticable.

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
baconeggs:

The hell? I don’t notice any major drop in gameplay until 400 where it starts to get choppy. 500 and frames are noticeably lacking. Any higher and I begin teleporting backwards as I run forwards.

You must really play slow games, I don’t know if something is wrong with me but I can clearly see the difference between 50 and 100 ping. More than 100 I consider lag.

It’s not speed that’s affected, it’s timing, and it becomes increasingly delayed with high ping.

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: Cameron_D
item.description:
Like I saud… EU and US people are usually much more sensitive to lag, forcing us to play on overseas servers, therefore we can live with lag moreso than them.

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: baconeggs
item.description:
Doom:

For me the 100 ping zone becomes uncomfortable. 300 is almost unplayable.

The hell? I don’t notice any major drop in gameplay until 400 where it starts to get choppy. 500 and frames are noticeably lacking. Any higher and I begin teleporting backwards as I run forwards.

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: Marb
item.description:
Ramirezoid:

marb your sig is the best

Thanks, at first I was kind of wondering if you were being sarcastic :lol:

Ace:

I just had to set up an account for this. This is really weird because there is a street by my house called Freeman St. And I thought of hl too. Sorry if nobody else thinks this is cool, maybe its just me.

P.S. I’ll play any source game or mod except CS:S cuz thats the one game i dont have. I’d prefer Garry’s Mod.

TBH, even though there is a Gordon Drive near my house, the Gordan sign in my sig is shopped - erm… uh, Gimped would be more accurate, I suppose.
I always thought of HL whenever I saw one of the signs until I started hanging out here - now I always think of Gordan.
Thanks a lot, jerks :hmph::pffft:

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day

item.description:
I’ve been in an Australian L4D server and I played with 1500+ ping, it was actually really smooth. o.0

Read full topic

item.title: BM game night/day
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
I still vote Sven, I am pretty sure about 99% of us already have HL1, so Sven is free like HL2DM. If we do do Sven I suggest we play some of the good custom campaigns as the HL1 campaign, no matter how epic, gets old and is too long.

I hope we don’t choose TF2 of TFc, I’ve played and disliked both.

Read full topic
